Joe consider his position. He did want to see the girls naked, and didn’t want to seem like a wimp in front of his friends, however, he didn’t want to not have any clothing to cover up with, even just a bra

Does Joe agree to all 4 going naked, or maintaining the original agreement, and demand they hand their bras over?
1352.title: Stay dressed until they we're the pitch side

info.brief_description: A group of students chooses to celebrate their exam with a party.
info.description: Jerry, Joe, Janice and Jasmine (The 4 J's) choose to celebrate their succesful exam with a party. Who will be attending, what will happen, where will it happen. You get to choose it all.
